Hello!: After a short break, we continued working.

你好！: 休息了一会儿，我们继续工作了。

Hello!:
Can I rest a bit?
May I take a rest for a while?
Although we're very tired, we still can't rest.
Nǐ hǎo!: Suīrán hěn lèi, dànshì hái bù néng xiūxi.
你好！: 虽然很累，但是还不能休息。

Hello!: Please give it to the driver.
Nǐ hǎo!: Qǐng bǎ tā ná gěi sījī. (also no na)

Hello!: I haven't seen or heard of such a thing.
Nǐ hǎo!: wǒ méi jiànguo yě méi tīng guò zhèyàng de shì .
你好！: 我没见过也没听过这样的事。

Hello!: There are approximately forty students in her class.
Nǐ hǎo!: tā bān shàng dàyuē yǒu 40 ge xuésheng . (also shang -> li) (you dayue, bad)

Hello!:
What time do you start work?
I start work at around 8:30.
Nǐ hǎo!:
Nǐ jǐ diǎn shàngbān?
Wǒ dàyuē bā diǎn bàn shàngbān.
你好！:
A你几点上班?
B我大约八点半上班。

Hello!: There are many foreign students.
The mother is saying goodbye to her child.
Nǐ hǎo!: Māma zài hé háizi dàobié. (also mama he haizi ...)

Hello!: We already discussed that topic.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒmen yǐjīng tǎolùn guò nàge huàtí.
你好！: 我们已经讨论过那个话题。

Hello!: Let us change the topic, ok?
The sun is very big.
The sun has come out/risen.
The sun not only gives us light, it also gives us heat.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tàiyáng bùjǐn gěi le wǒmen guāng, érqiě gěi le wǒmen rè. (also no le)
你好！: 太阳不仅给了我们光,而且给了我们热。

Hello!: The quality of this piece of clothing is very good.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhè jiàn yīfu de zhìliàng hěn hǎo.

Hello!: This school is very big.
He studies at this school.
Nǐ hǎo!:
Tā zài zhè suǒ xuéxiào dúshū.
(Also ta dushu zai zhe...) (also just du, but not as clear)
(Also ta nian zhe...) (nian is dialect)

Hello!: His girlfriend plans on teaching English at a high school.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tāde nǚpéngyou dǎsuan zài gāozhōng jiāo Yīngwén.
你好！: 他的女朋友打算在高中教英文。

Hello!: I've heard that you plan on teaching English at a university.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ tīngshuō nǐ dǎsuan zài dàxué jiāo Yīngwén.
你好！: 我听说你打算在大学教英文。

Hello!: He is my boss.
Has your boss been to China?
He is my boss.
Do you like your boss?
Nǐ hǎo!: Nǐ xǐhuan nǐ de lǎobǎn ma?

Hello!: The boss gave him a one-time opportunity to travel.
Nǐ hǎo!: Lǎobǎn gěi le tā yī cì lǚyóu de jīhuì.
你好！: 老板给了他一次旅游的机会。

Hello!: She doesn't know how to choose.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā bùzhī rúhé xuǎnzé. (also zhidao) (also zenme)

Hello!: What do you think?
This matter is very strange.
I heard a strange thing. (matter/issue)
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ tīng dào yī jiàn hěn qíguài de shìqing.
你好！: 我听到一件很奇怪的事情。

Hello!: It's strange that he would say this.
Let me introduce my old friend.
Nǐ hǎo!: Ràng wǒ jièshào yī xià wǒde lǎo péngyou.
你好！: 让我介绍一下我的老朋友。

Hello!: Allow me to introduce you, this is my old friend.
Nǐ hǎo!: Ràng wǒ lái jièshào yíxià, zhè shì wǒ de lǎopénɡyou.
你好！: 让我来介绍一下,这是我的老朋友。

Hello!: He ran into an old friend.
The company met difficulties.
If I were you, under such a difficult situation I would do the same kind of thing.
Nǐ hǎo!:
rúguǒ wǒ shì nǐ, wǒ huì zài zhèzhǒng kùnnan de qíngkuàng xià zuò tóngyàng de shì.
(tongyang / tongyiyang / yiyang)
你好！: 如果我是你，我会在这种困难的情况下做同样的事。

Hello!: My home is only one kilometer from school.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ jiā lí xuéxiào zhǐ yǒu yī gōnglǐ.
你好！: 我家离学校只有一公里。

Hello!: I don't want to wait that long.
Nǐ hǎo!: wǒ bù xiǎng děng nàme jiǔ .

Hello!: She lives off this money.
I learned to live without her.
Nǐ hǎo!: wǒ xuéhuì le bù kào tā shēnghuó .

Hello!: My younger sister is eight years old.
When will your little sister go to university?
Nǐ hǎo!: Nǐ mèimèi shénme shíhòu shàng dàxué?
你好！: 你妹妹什么时候上大学？

Hello!: My little sister very much resembles my mother.
Nǐ hǎo!: wǒ mèimei hěn xiàng wǒ māma.

Hello!: My little sister watched TV yesterday.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ mèimèi zuótiān kàn diànshì le.

Hello!: She has two younger sisters.
What time does your little sister go to school?
I need to give my little sister a phone call.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ yào gěi wǒ mèimèi dǎ diànhuà.

Hello!: My younger sister is twenty-one years old, she's a college student.
Nǐ hǎo!: wǒ mèimei 21 suì, shì ge dàxuéshēng.

Hello!: Is your friend going to the office?
Nǐ hǎo!: Nǐ péngyou yào qù bàngōngshì ma?

Hello!:
Do you have a computer?
I have one at the office.
Nǐ hǎo!:
Nǐ yǒu diànnǎo ma?
Wǒ zài bàngōngshì yǒu yī gè.
你好！:
A你有电脑吗?
B我在办公室有一个。

Hello!: I'm not going to the office.
The boss is not in the office.
She will be going to the office.
See you tomorrow in the office.
When she found out they still had no schools, she started one.
Nǐ hǎo!: dāng tā fāxiàn tāmen hái méiyǒu xuéxiào, tā jiù bàn le yī ge.
你好！: 当她发现他们还没有学校，她就办了一个。

Hello!: I continuously want to (see/be with) you.
Nǐ hǎo!: wǒ yīzhí xiǎng jiàn nǐ. (also jiandao)

Hello!: Everyone wants to meet you, you're too famous☺.
Nǐ hǎo!: dàjiā dōu xiǎng jiàn dào nǐ, nǐ tài yǒumíng le!
你好！: 大家都想见到你，你太有名了！

Hello!: This city is very famous.
I've been going out with her for months.
Nǐ hǎo!: wǒ hé tā wàichū le jǐ ge yuè .

Hello!: Nothing is more beautiful than the truth.
Nǐ hǎo!:
méiyǒu shénme bǐ zhēnshí gèng měi le. (also meili)
(also no geng or le, but weaker)
你好！: 没有什么比真实更美了。

Hello!: This website is truly useful.
I'm not familiar with this matter.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ duì zhè gè shìqing bù shúxī.

Hello!: She is both pretty and has money. (formal)
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā jì piàoliang, yòu yǒu qián. (first you4 -> ji4 is formal)

Hello!: What's your reason?
In what way shall I tell him (that)?
Nǐ hǎo!: Yòng shénme fāngshì gàosu tā ne?

Hello!: We like his way of talking very much.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒmen hěn xǐhuan tā shuōhuà de fāngshì.
你好！: 我们很喜欢他说话的方式。

Hello!: She doesn't like the way I speak.
Nǐ hǎo!: tā bù xǐhuān wǒ shuōhuà de fāngshì .
你好！: 她不喜欢我说话的方式。

Hello!: Jack can't afford to buy a new bicycle.
Nǐ hǎo!: Jack mǎibùqǐ xīn zìxíngchē. (also yi liang xin ..)

Hello!:
Whose bike is this?
Whose bicycle is this?
Nǐ hǎo!: zhè liàng zìxíngchē shì shéi de ?

Hello!:
This is my bike.
This is my bicycle.
I will give you a bike for your birthday.
Nǐ hǎo!: nǐ shēngrì de shíhou, wǒ sòng nǐ yī liàng zìxíngchē .
你好！: 你生日的时候，我送你一辆自行车。

Hello!: He gets up late every day.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā měi tiān dōu qǐ de wǎn.

Hello!: As soon as you see him, you need to give me a call.
Nǐ hǎo!: nǐ yī kàn dào tā, jiù yào dǎ diàn huà gěi wǒ!
你好！: 你一看到他就要打电话给我！

Hello!: He grew up in a teacher's household.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā zài jiàoshī jiātíng zhōng chéngzhǎng. (jiàoshī for occupation)

Hello!: She took a liking to this car.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā xiāngzhòng le zhè liàng chē.

Hello!: He at last reached his goal.
Nǐ hǎo!:
tā zhōngyú wánchéng le tā de mùbiāo.
(also daodi) (no zuodao, zuodao only at the end)
你好！: 他终于完成了他的目标。

Hello!: My spirits are not too good.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ de jīngshen bù tài hǎo.

Hello!: He's writing a report.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā zài xiě bàogào. (also yi fen baogao)

Hello!: Finishing the report by tomorrow is practically impossible.
Nǐ hǎo!: zài míngtiān qián wánchéng bàogào jīhū shì bù kěnéng de. (also zhe fen baogao)
你好！: 在明天前完成报告几乎是不可能的。

Hello!: I've already eaten enough.
I live on the second floor.
He parked his car in front of the (big) building.
Nǐ hǎo!: tā bǎ chē tíng zài dàlóu qián.

Hello!:
Would your older brother want to go?
It's difficult to say.
Nǐ hǎo!:
Nǐ gēgē xiǎng qù ma?
Hěn nán shuō.

Hello!: Don't cry like a child.
Nǐ hǎo!: bùyào kū de xiàng ge háizi shìde.
你好！: 不要哭得像个孩子似的。

Hello!: This book is very old.
One is new, and the other is old.
Nǐ hǎo!: yī ge shì xīn de, lìng yī ge shì jiù de .
你好！: 一个是新的，另一个是旧的。

Hello!: His house was small and old.
Nǐ hǎo!: tā de fángzi yòu xiǎo yòu jiù .

Hello!: His bicycle is already very worn.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tāde zìxíngchē yǐjīng hěn jiù le.
你好！: 他的自行车已经很旧了。

Hello!: The vehicle is already old.
I'm feeling between a rock and a hard place.
They are brothers.
He is a computer expert. (polite)
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā shì yī míng diànnǎo zhuānjiā.

Hello!: He is an expert in economics.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā shì jīngjì zhuānjiā. (also jingji de) (also yi ming)

Hello!: Mom is reading with me.
I don't like to accompany my wife to buy things.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ bù xǐhuan péi tàitai mǎi dōngxi.
你好！: 我不喜欢陪太太买东西。

Hello!: Mrs. Zhang likes to spend money very much.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhāng tàitai hěn xǐhuan huā qián.

Hello!: I especially like eating out.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ tèbié xǐhuan zài wàimiàn chīfàn.
你好！: 我特别喜欢在外面吃饭。

Hello!: The problem is obvious.
The rain has stopped.
The rain began to fall.
He is Canadian.
Mr. Zhang has already left.
I forgot about that (matter/issue).
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ bǎ nà jiàn shì wàng le. (also na jian shi wo wang le)

Hello!: Uh-oh, I forgot.
The world is really big!
Don't let this kind of thing happen again!
Nǐ hǎo!: bù yào zài ràng zhè zhǒng shì fāshēng le!
你好！: 不要再让这种事发生了！

Hello!:
I don't want something like this to happen.
I didn't want this to happen.
Nǐ hǎo!: wǒ bù xiǎng zhèzhǒng shì fāshēng .

Hello!: We live in the same world.
Nǐ hǎo!:
Wǒmen shēnghuó zài tóng yī gè shìjiè.
(Also dou or dajia dou)
你好！: 我们生活在同一个世界。

Hello!: This is my book (this book is the same as my book.)
Nǐ hǎo!: zhè hé wǒ nà běn shì tóng yī běn shū.
你好！: 这和我那本是同一本书。

Hello!: Everyone will go to class.
I will go to class.
I feel very very thankful!
How many boys are in this class?
Nǐ hǎo!: zhè gè bān yǒu duōshao nánshēng ?

Hello!: My son has grown tall.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ de érzi zhǎng gāo le.

Hello!: They're studying the world map.
This is a map.
My friend gave me a map.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ de péngyou gěi le wǒ yī gè dìtú. (also yi zhang1)
你好！: 我的朋友给了我一个地图。

Hello!: Whose map is this?
This bicycle belongs to me.
Taiwan belongs to China.
He is outstanding.
Her grades are outstanding.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā de xuéxí chéngjì hěn yōuxiù. (also no xuexi)

Hello!: His grades are outstanding.
Only through hard work will one have good achievements.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhǐ yǒu nǔlì cái yǒu hǎo chéngjì.

Hello!: She only has five yuan.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā cái yǒu wǔ yuán qián.

Hello!: Everyone's performance was outstanding.
Nǐ hǎo!: Dàjiā de biǎoxiàn dōu hěn yōuxiù.

Hello!: His performance is outstanding.
I understand your (emotional response).
His story is partly true.
Nǐ hǎo!: tā de gùshi yībùfèn shì zhēn de .
你好！: 他的故事一部分是真的。

Hello!: What to do next (about this)?
I can count from one to ten.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ néng cóng yī shǔ dào shí. (also hui)

Hello!: This child can count to twenty.
Nǐ hǎo!: zhè háizi néng shǔ dào 20. (also ge)

Hello!: What time does the play begin?
This math problem is very difficult.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhè dào shùxué tí hěn nán.

Hello!: I've heard that you are a math teacher.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ tīng shuō nǐ shì shùxué lǎoshī.

Hello!: This math problem is easy.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhè dào shùxué tí hěn róngyì.

Hello!: This math problem is easy.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhè dào shùxué tí hěn róngyì.

Hello!: He passed the math exam.
The teacher is teaching us math.
He doesn't teach math.
I like both science and math.
Nǐ hǎo!: kēxué hé shùxué wǒ dōu xǐhuān .

Hello!: Science is the foundation of economic development.
Nǐ hǎo!: Kēxué shì jīngjì fāzhǎn de jīchǔ.
你好！: 科学是经济发展的基础。

Hello!: The effect of economic development is both good and bad.
Nǐ hǎo!: Jīngjì fāzhǎn de yǐngxiǎng yǒu hǎo yě yǒu huài.
你好！: 经济发展的影响有好也有坏。

Hello!: What are you doing?
What are they doing?
They provide telephone service.
This set of clothes is definitely pretty.
I'm under big pressure now.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ xiànzài yālì hěn dà. (also xianzai de)

Hello!: The pressure on Chinese students to study hard is great.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhōngguó xuésheng de xuéxí yālì hěn dà.
你好！: 中国学生的学习压力很大。

Hello!: Let me introduce myself.
Everybody introduce themselves.
Though exhausted from running, many of them didn't give up.
Nǐ hǎo!: Suīrán pǎo de hěn lèi, dànshì hěn duō rén dōu méiyǒu fàngqì.
你好！: 虽然跑得很累，但是很多人都没有放弃。

Hello!: They gave up working hard.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tāmen fàngqì le nǔlì. (no nuli fangqile)

Hello!: This news is fake.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhè gè xiāoxi shì jiǎ de.

Hello!: We believe this report is false.
Nǐ hǎo!: wǒmen rènwéi zhè fèn bàogào shì jiǎ de .
你好！: 我们认为这份报告是假的。

Hello!: I will never forget you.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ yǒngyuǎn dōu bù huì wàngjì nǐ.

Hello!: I suddenly forgot.
Put away your bicycle.
Nǐ hǎo!: bǎ nǐ de zìxíngchē fàng hǎo .

Hello!: When a friend has trouble, of course one needs to help.
Nǐ hǎo!: Péngyou yǒu kùnnan, dāngrán yào bāngmáng. (also bangzhu)
你好！: 朋友有困难，当然要帮忙。

Hello!: The train has arrived at the station.
I don't like tea.

Does your friend like tea?
Not that much. Do you like tea?
Nǐ hǎo!:
Nǐ péngyou xǐhuan chá ma?
Bú tài xǐhuan. Nǐ xǐhuan chá ma?
你好！:
A你朋友喜欢茶吗?
B不太喜欢。你喜欢茶吗?

Hello!: Do you like tea?
Do you still need tea?
Can you give me some more tea?
Nǐ hǎo!: nǐ néng zài gěi wǒ diǎn chá ma?

Hello!: Would you like some more tea? (polite)
Nǐ hǎo!: nín xiǎng zài lái diǎn chá ma?

Hello!: I'm very busy this week.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhè zhōu wǒ hěn máng. (also wo zhe zhou...)

Hello!: I worked continuously this week.
Nǐ hǎo!: zhè zhōu wǒ yīzhí zài gōngzuò .

Hello!: It was raining for a week.
Nǐ hǎo!: yǔ xià le yī zhōu. (Also xia yu le yi zhou)

Hello!: What movies are released this week?
Within approximately two weeks.
How do you know Ms. Zhou?
Nǐ hǎo!: Nǐ zěnme rènshi Zhōu xiǎojiě de?

Hello!: Ms. Zhou's hobby is exercising.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhōu xiǎojiě de àihào shì yùndòng.

Hello!: Ms. Zhou is going to see a movie.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhōu xiǎojiě yào qù kàn diànyǐng.

Hello!: I'll give Ms. Zhou a phone call.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ yào gěi Zhōu xiǎojiě dǎ diànhuà.

Hello!: What time does Ms. Zhou go to work?
Ms. Zhou is at home now.
Where does Ms. Zhou work?
Excuse me, where is Ms. Zhou?
Ms. Zhou teaches English at a primary school.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhōu xiǎojiě zài xiǎoxué jiāo Yīngwén.

Hello!: When will Ms. Zhou go to Japan?
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhōu xiǎojiě shénme shíhòu yào qù Rìběn?
你好！: 周小姐什么时候要去日本？

Hello!: Ms. Zhou has not been to France.
School's out.
He got first place in the exam.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā kǎoshì dé le dì yī míng.

Hello!: This is a mistake.
The policemen said to them, "Stop."
I find information on the internet.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ shàngwǎng zhǎo zīliào. (also zai wangshang)

Hello!: Your pen is better than mine.
Nǐ hǎo!: nǐ de bǐ bǐ wǒ de hǎo .

Hello!: This isn't a small sum of money.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhè yī bǐ qián bù shǎo.

Hello!: NBA is professional games.
Teaching English is his profession.
Nǐ hǎo!: jiāo yīngyǔ shì tā de zhíyè .

Hello!: The clock does not run.
This piece of clothing is very cheap.
That thing is very cheap.
Maybe seems very cheap.
He is seriously ill.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā bìng de hěn yánzhòng. (also ta de bing)

Hello!: It took John about two weeks to get over his illness.
Nǐ hǎo!: chàbuduō liǎng zhōu John de bìng cái hǎo le .
你好！: 差不多两周John的病才好了。

Hello!: She is very angry today.
You look like you're very angry.
They're discussing a project.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tāmen zài tǎolùn yī gè xiàngmù.

Hello!: I'm a college freshman this year.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ jīnnián dàxué yī niánjí. (also shi)

Hello!: My kid is in the third year of elementary school.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ de háizi xiǎoxué sān niánjí. (also shi/zai/nian/du)

Hello!: My younger sister and I are in the same grade.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ hé wǒ mèimei zài tóng yī gè niánjí.
你好！: 我和我妹妹在同一个年级。

Hello!: Do it when you have time, ok?
Nǐ hǎo!: nǐ yǒu shíjiān zài zuò ba.

Hello!: I don't know if I have time to do it.
Nǐ hǎo!: wǒ bùzhī dào wǒ shìfǒu yǒu shíjiān zuò .
你好！: 我不知道我是否有时间做。

Hello!: She likes animals.
I'm staying at home alone.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ yī gè rén dāi zài jiāli.

Hello!: There are no classes in August. (formal)
He's my younger brother.

Hello!: I'm drinking water.

Hello!: Regardless of what I do, she always says I can do better.

Hello!: She insists on her own opinion.

Hello!: She insisted that was my fault.

Hello!: That is my ideal.

Hello!: Teachers point out student's problems.

Hello!: He has many female friends.

A你想不想去那里?
B不想。我想去市场。

Hello!: What time do you finish work?

What time do you finish work?

Nǐ jǐ diǎn xiàbān.
Yìbān xiàwǔ wǔ diǎn.

A你几点下班?

Hello!: I don't remember when he gets off work.

Hello!: What time does your older brother finish work?

Nǐ hǎo!: wǒ xiǎng nǐ děng wǒ děng dào 7 diǎn xiàbān .
你好！: 我想你等我等到7点下班。

Hello!: She waited waited waited until noon.

Hello!: The sky is very blue.

Hello!: You'll find it difficult to please her.

Hello!: He's expounding his theory.

Hello!: The teacher is not in the classroom.

Hello!: Her fingers are very pretty.

"Will you have some more coffee?" "No, thanks. I've had enough."

Hello!: You drank too much coffee.

Hello!: This is clearly the best novel that has been published this year.

Zhǔrèn lái ma?

wǒ bùguǎn nǐmen de míngzi jiào shénme.
yīdàn gōngzuò wánchéng, wǒ jiù cóng zhèr líkāi.
(also bu zaihu) (also wanyi)

Nǐ hǎo!: tāmen shì rèài hépíng de rén .

Hello!: Every month, he has a stable income.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā měi gè yuè yǒu wěndìng de shōurù.
你好！: 他每个月有稳定的收入。

Hello!: Stable politics bring a stable economy.
你好！: 政治稳定带来经济稳定。

Hello!: He's very pitiful.
Your appearance is really pitiful.
Pitifully few people support him.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhīchí tā de rén, shǎo de kělián.

Hello!: Her car is parked by the road.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā de chē tíng zài lù biān.

Hello!: There are many trees alongside the road.
Nǐ hǎo!: Lù biān yǒu hěn duō shù.

Hello!: Trees have roots.
This (schoolwork) problem is very complicated.
Probably, their communication is more complicated than we thought.
Nǐ hǎo!: hěn kěnéng tāmen de jiāoliú bǐ wǒmen xiǎng de gèng fùzá .
你好！: 很可能他们的交流比我们想的更复杂。

Hello!: The matter is too complicated!
Generally speaking, environmental problems are very complicated.
你好！: 总的来说，环境问题很复杂。

Hello!: International problems are very very complicated.
Their whole family immigrated to China.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tāmen yījiā dōu yímín dào Zhōngguó le.
你好！: 他们一家都移民到中国了。

Hello!: I have run for approximately 13 seconds.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ dàgài pǎo le shísān miǎo.

Hello!: Germany has already reunified.
He is an expert in this field.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā shì zhè gè lǐngyù de zhuānjiā.

Hello!: He fully and deeply understood his mother's words.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā chōngfèn lǐjiě le māma de huà.
你好！: 他充分理解了妈妈的话。

Hello!: Can you use this software?
Nǐ hǎo!: Nǐ huì yòng zhè ge ruǎnjiàn ma?

Hello!: China's economy is developing rapidly.
Science&technology advances very rapidly.
Hadn't we better be going soon?
Nǐ hǎo!: wǒmen zǎo diǎn zǒu bù shì gèng hǎo ma?
你好！: 我们早点走不是更好吗？

Hello!: Promise me you'll do what you say.
He admitted his was wrong to the teacher.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā xiàng lǎoshī chéngrèn tā cuò le.

Hello!: There are many tools on the desk/table.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhuōzi shàng yǒu hěn duō gōngjù.

Hello!: If the weather allows, we will set off in an hour.
Nǐ hǎo!: rúguǒ tiānqì yǔnxǔ dehuà, wǒmen yī xiǎoshí hòu chūfā .
你好！: 如果天气允许的话，我们1小时后出发。

Hello!: We should protect historical resources very well.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒmen yīnggāi bǎohù hǎo lìshǐ zīyuán.
你好！: 我们应该保护好历史资源。

Hello!: Yue means to say.
She's fallen asleep.
He's fallen asleep.
This family calls this dog 'Spot'.
Nǐ hǎo!: zhè tiáo gǒu bèi zhè jiārén jiàozuò "Spot". (also zhi gou)

Hello!: This fish has died.
This fish is really big.
I'm going to the restaurant.
Where is the restaurant?
Are you going to the restaurant?
I'm not feeling too well. (physical)
I don't feel too well, but I still went to work.
Nǐ hǎo!: wǒ juéde bù tài shūfu, dàn wǒ hái shì qù shàngbān le .
你好！: 我觉得不太舒服，但我还是去上班了。

Hello!: Are your eyes uncomfortable?
This topic makes me feel uncomfortable.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhè gè huàtí ràng wǒ juéde bù shūfu.
你好！: 这个话题让我觉得不舒服。

Hello!: He doesn't feel well (in body).
I don't feel too good today.
Nǐ hǎo!: wǒ jīntiān gǎnjué bù tài shūfu.

Hello!: He was very tired, sleeping a bit felt really good.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā hěn lèi, shuì le yī jiào gǎnjué zhēn shūfu.
你好！: 他很累，睡了一觉感觉真舒服。

Hello!: After a bit of *very good* sleep, I felt much better.
Nǐ hǎo!: hǎohǎo shuì le yī jiào yǐhòu, wǒ gǎnjué hǎo duō le.
你好！: 好好睡了一觉以后，我感觉好多了。

Hello!: I've been to Russia before.
I'm going to Russia tomorrow.
The patient is much better today.
The patient's situation is very stable.
What's the patient's status?
The doctor is treating his patient.
Nǐ hǎo!: Yīshēng zài zhìliáo tā de bìngrén.

Hello!: Miss, can I please ask how to get to the railway station?
Nǐ hǎo!: Xiǎojiě, qǐng wèn huǒchē zhàn zěnme zǒu?
你好！: 小姐，请问火车站怎么走？

Hello!: Where did you go? I went to the train station to see off my friend.
Nǐ hǎo!: nǐ qù nǎr le? wǒ qù le huǒchēzhàn sòng wǒ de yī ge péngyou.
你好！: “你去哪儿了？”“我去了火车站送我的一个朋友。”

Hello!: Why is she going to the train station?
Let me look after you.
My papa's love and caring for me is no less than my mama.
Nǐ hǎo!: wǒ bàba duì wǒ de ài hé zhàogu bù bǐ wǒ māma shǎo.
你好！: 我爸爸对我的爱和照顾不比我妈妈少。

Hello!: You're really an angel!
The Chinese economy is growing very fast.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhōngguó de jīngjì zēngzhǎng hěn kuài.

Hello!: What kind of personality do you believe you have?
Nǐ hǎo!: Nǐ rènwéi nǐ shì shénme xìnggé de rén?
你好！: 你认为你是什么性格的人？

Hello!: Believe me, her personality is very very good!
Nǐ hǎo!: Xiāngxìn wǒ, tā de xìnggé fēicháng hǎo!
你好！: 相信我，她的性格非常好！

Hello!: Stay there, don't move.
Compared to going out, I prefer to stay at home.
Nǐ hǎo!: bǐqǐ chūmén, wǒ gèng xǐhuān dāi zài jiā. (also he chumen biqilai)
你好！: 比起出门，我更喜欢待在家。

Hello!: I'm sorry, I can't stay long.
Nǐ hǎo!: duìbuqǐ, wǒ bù néng dāi hěn jiǔ .

Hello!: That's the location of the problem☺.
Nǐ hǎo!: nà jiù shì wèntí suǒzài le.

Hello!: The semester is over.
Do you know the manager?
The manager appears to be very angry.
Excuse me, where is your manager?
Nǐ hǎo!: Qǐngwèn, nǐ de jīnglǐ zài nǎli?

Hello!: The manager did not come.
Who is your manager?
Let me introduce my manager (to you).
Nǐ hǎo!: Ràng wǒ jièshào yīxià wǒ de jīnglǐ.
你好！: 让我介绍一下我的经理。

Hello!: She knows this manager.
The manager is at the office.
Allow me to introduce you, this is my manager.
Nǐ hǎo!: Ràng wǒ lái jièshào yī xià zhè shì wǒde jīnglǐ.
你好！: 让我来介绍一下,这是我的经理。

Hello!: The manager adopted his plan of action.
Nǐ hǎo!: Jīnglǐ cǎiqǔ le tā de fāng'àn.

Hello!: He studies the hardest in his class.
Nǐ hǎo!: tā zài tā bān lǐ xuéxí zuì nǔlì.
你好！: 他在他班里学习最努力。

Hello!: If any issue, please drop me a line.
Nǐ hǎo!: Yǒu shì, qǐng gěi wǒ liúyán.

Hello!: The fingernails are too long!
What keeps you still up that late?
Nǐ hǎo!: shì shénme ràng nǐ nàme wǎn hái xǐngzhe?
你好！: 是什么让你那么晚还醒着？

Hello!: I give you a small gift.
Nǐ hǎo!: Sòng nǐ yī ge xiǎo lǐwù. (also yi fen)

Hello!: He gave me a gift.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā sòng wǒ yī fèn lǐwù.

Hello!: She accepted my gift.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā jiēshòu le wǒ de lǐwù.

Hello!: My father gives me a birthday gift every year.
Nǐ hǎo!: Bàba měi nián dōu sòng wǒ shēngrì lǐwù. (also yi fen)
你好！: 爸爸每年都送我生日礼物。

Hello!: I give this gift to you.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhè fèn lǐwù sòng gěi nǐ.

Hello!: Has she already seen the contract?
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā yǐjīng kàn guò hétong le ma?

Hello!: This problem should be solved thoroughly.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhè gè wèntí yīnggāi chèdǐ jiějué.
你好！: 这个问题应该彻底解决。

Hello!: He's too smart! Really, a genius.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā tài cōngmíng le, zhēn shì ge tiāncái.
你好！: 他太聪明了,真是个天才。

Hello!: Those children are not smart.
He is as smart as the other boys in the class.
Nǐ hǎo!: tā hé bān shàng qítā nánshēng yīyàng cōngmíng.
你好！: 他和班上其他男生一样聪明。

Hello!: His daughter is both smart and pretty. (formal)
Nǐ hǎo!: Tāde nǚér jì cōngmíng yòu piàoliang. (First you4 -> ji4 is formal)
你好！: 他的女儿既聪明又漂亮。

Hello!: She is both pretty and smart. (formal)
Nǐ hǎo!: tā jì piàoliang yòu cōngmíng. (First you4 -> ji4 is formal)

Hello!: Your son is very smart. (polite)
I'm really not smart.
I am not as smart as he.
This child is smart.
He is very smart.
Your daughter is very smart. (polite)
She's not only pretty, but also smart.
Nǐ hǎo!: tā bùdàn piàoliang, érqiě cōngmíng. (also bujin) (also you4 congming)

Hello!: Now, let me expound in detail.
Nǐ hǎo!: Xiànzài, ràng wǒ xiángxì de shuōmíng yīxià.
你好！: 现在，让我详细地说明一下。

Hello!: He told me in detail the issues he went through.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā xiángxì de gàosu le wǒ shìqing de jīngguò.
你好！: 他详细地告诉了我事情的经过。

Hello!: I rent my house.
Did you rent a house/apartment?
We're from the Orient.
This class year has graduated.
You should study more.
Nǐ hǎo!: nǐ gāi xué de gèng duō. (Also no de)

Hello!: He's too fat.
You've gotten fat.
He is tall and fat, and still always busy.
Nǐ hǎo!: tā yòu gāo yòu pàng, hái zǒngshì hěn máng .
你好！: 他又高又胖，还总是很忙。

Hello!: Clearly, he still doesn't understand where the problem is.
Nǐ hǎo!: Xiǎnrán, tā hái bù liǎojiě wèntí zài nǎli. (also suozai)
你好！: 显然，他还不了解问题在哪里。

Hello!: Don't believe a man whose past you don't understand anything about.
Nǐ hǎo!: bù yào xiāngxìn yī ge nǐ yīdiǎn dōu bù liǎojiě tā guòqù de rén .
你好！: 不要相信一个你一点都不了解他过去的人。

Hello!: The regular eight o'clock bus arrived early today.
Nǐ hǎo!: 8 diǎn nà bānchē jīntiān zǎo dào le .

Hello!: The structure of these houses is very simple.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhèxiē fángzi de jiégòu hěn jiǎndān.
你好！: 这些房子的结构很简单。

Hello!: Before, she had been an editor.
The rain outside is falling more and more hard! (xiayu is not a noun)
Nǐ hǎo!: Wàimiàn de yǔ yuè xià yuè dà le.

Hello!: He eats too much, he's getting more and more fat.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā tài néng chī, yuè zhǎng yuè pàng le.

Hello!: I will live in Dalian.
He's not going back to Dalian today.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā jīntiān bù huí Dàlián. (also huiqu)

Hello!: I believe Dalian is a very clean city.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ rènwéi Dàlián shì gè gānjìng de chéngshì. (also shi zuo)
你好！: 我认为大连是个很干净的城市。

Hello!: When will you go to Dalian?
Nǐ hǎo!: Nǐ shénme shíhòu yào qù Dàlián?

Hello!: I haven't been to Dalian.
How's Dalian?
I've earned some money.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ zhuàn le yī bǐ qián.

Hello!: He earned as much money as possible.
Nǐ hǎo!: tā néng zhuàn duōshao jiù zhuàn duōshao .

Hello!: Now, science is highly developed.
The transportation system in HK is highly developed.
I like coffee better than tea.
Nǐ hǎo!: Hé chá xiāngbǐ, wǒ gèng xǐhuan kāfēi. (also he cha biqilai, also biqi cha)
你好！: 和茶相比，我更喜欢咖啡。

Hello!: Let me practice for a moment.
I don't have too many opportunities to practice speaking Chinese.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ méiyǒu tài duō jīhuì liànxí shuō Hànyǔ.
你好！: 我没有太多机会练习说汉语。

Hello!: Very regrettably, my students don't have too many opportunities to practice speaking English.
Nǐ hǎo!: Hěn kěxī, wǒ de xuésheng méiyǒu tài duō jīhuì liànxí shuō Yīngyǔ.
你好！: 很可惜，我的学生没有太多机会练习说英语。

Hello!: It's important to practice daily.
This is a good opportunity to practice English.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhè shì yī gè liànxí Yīngyǔ de hǎo jīhuì.
你好！: 这是一个练习英语的好机会。

Hello!: On what grounds do you ask me to go?
Nǐ hǎo!: nǐ píng shénme jiào wǒ zǒu?

Hello!: To study Chinese, you need to speak a lot, and practice lot, then it's ok.
Nǐ hǎo!: Xué hànyǔ, yào duō shuō, duō liànxí, cái xíng.
你好！: 学汉语要多说，多练习才行。

Hello!: The student(s) received encouragement.
My teacher encourages me to study Chinese well.
Nǐ hǎo!: Lǎoshī gǔlì wǒ xuéhǎo hànyǔ. (no laoshi xiang wo ...)

Hello!: She's hiding behind a tree.
Please pour me a glass of water.
Nǐ hǎo!: Qǐng tì wǒ dào bēi shuǐ.

Hello!: She takes the subway train to work.
I'll tell you a secret.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ gàosu nǐ yī gè mìmì.

Hello!: He told her secret to his friends.
Nǐ hǎo!: tā bǎ tā de mìmì gàosu le tā de péngyou .
你好！: 他把她的秘密告诉了他的朋友。

Hello!: This is a secret. Don't tell anyone.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhè shì ge mìmì, bù yào gàosu biérén. (also renhe ren)
你好！: 这是个秘密，不要告诉别人。

Hello!: These seats are set aside for the elderly.
Nǐ hǎo!: bǎ zhè xiē zuòwèi liú gěi lǎorén. (no ba more like a command)

Hello!: When I was studying in college, I lived in the school dormitory.
Nǐ hǎo!: Niàn dàxué de shíhou, wǒ zhù zài xuéxiào sùshè. (also nian (dialect) -> du)
你好！: 念大学的时候，我住在学校宿舍。

Hello!: Four people live in one dorm.
Nǐ hǎo!: Yī gè sùshè zhù sì gè rén.

Hello!: Regrettably, he failed.
He stole my bag.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā qiǎng le wǒ de bāo.

Hello!: That person used a gun to rob the bank.
Nǐ hǎo!: Nà ge rén yòng qiāng qiǎng yínháng.

Hello!: I have a handgun.
He carelessly fired a gun.
Nǐ hǎo!: tā suíbiàn kāi le yī qiāng. (also ye ba qiang)

Hello!: He casually ate a few bites and just left.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā suíbiàn chī le jǐ kǒu jiù zǒu le.
你好！: 他随便吃了几口就走了。

Hello!: His attire is very casual.
They're wearing the same clothes.
I'm living in the west part of America.
There are four children here.
He remembered her name.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā jìzhu le tā de míngzi. (also jide)

Hello!: He doesn't believe in fate.
He can teach very well.
The students like the teacher's way of teaching.
Nǐ hǎo!: Xuéshengmen xǐhuan lǎoshī jiāoshū de fāngshì.
你好！: 学生们喜欢老师教书的方式。

Hello!: Can foreigners teach at a university in China?
Nǐ hǎo!: Wàiguórén kěyǐ zài Zhōngguó de dàxué lǐ jiāoshū ma?
你好！: 外国人可以在中国的大学里教书吗？

Hello!: He teaches at a middle school in Shanghai.
He earns his living by teaching.
Our school has very many foreign students.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒmen xuéxiào yǒu hěn duō hǎiwài liúxuéshēng.
你好！: 我们学校有很多海外留学生。

Hello!: Her parents very dearly love her, she feels very happy/blessed.
Nǐ hǎo!: Fùmǔ hěn téng tā, tā gǎnjué hěn xìngfú. (also tengai)
你好！: 父母很疼她，她感觉很幸福。

Hello!: My feet hurt very much.
The children washed (those people's) feet.
Nǐ hǎo!: háizimen xǐ le tāmen de jiǎo. (also naxie ren)

Hello!: Please wash your hands clean.
My job is to wash dishes.
I've eaten one bowl of rice.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ chī le yī wǎn fàn.

Hello!: He only needs something to eat, he is very satisfied☺.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhǐ yào yǒu fàn chī, tā jiù hěn mǎnzú le. (also manyi)
你好！: 只要有饭吃他就很满足了。

Hello!: You only need to work hard, you will naturally succeed.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhǐ yào nǐ nǔlì, zìrán huì chénggōng.
你好！: 只要你努力，自然会成功。

Hello!: Having finished eating, he got ready to go to work.
Nǐ hǎo!: Chī wán fàn, tā zhǔnbèi qù shàngbān le.
你好！: 吃完饭，他准备去上班了。

Hello!: I use credit cards to buy things.
I accept any criticism.
This is my telephone number.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhè shì wǒ de diànhuà hàomǎ.

Hello!: Please tell me the telephone number.
The old man attempted to swim five kilometers.
This decision is in line with the current situation.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zhè gè juédìng fúhé xiànzài de qíngkuàng.
你好！: 这个决定符合现在的情况。

Hello!: His work has recently been going very smoothly.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā de gōngzuò zuìjìn hěn shùnlì.

Hello!: He smoothly completed this task.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā shùnlì de wánchéng le zhè xiàng rènwu. (also ta hen shunli wancheng ...)
你好！: 他顺利地完成了这项任务。

Hello!: I hope the two nations cooperate smoothly.
They cooperated and finished this design.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tāmen hézuò wánchéng le zhè xiàng shèjì.
你好！: 他们合作完成了这项设计。

Hello!: I'm afraid there's no way you can marry her.
Nǐ hǎo!: wǒ pà nǐ méifǎ gēn tā jiéhūn.

Hello!: They have the same kind of notions.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tāmen yǒu tóngyàng de guānniàn. (tongyang / tongyiyang / yiyang)

Hello!: Behind his way of doing things, was another purpose.
Nǐ hǎo!: Tā zuòfǎ de bèihòu, biéyǒu mùdì.
你好！: 他做法的背后，别有目的。

Hello!:
I believe that behind every thing we should do,
there's always something we want to do.
Nǐ hǎo!:
wǒ rènwéi wǒmen gāi zuò de měi jiàn shì bèihòu,
zǒng yǒu shénme wǒmen xiǎng zuò de.
你好！: 我认为我们该做的每件事背后，总有什么我们想做的...

Hello!: He's the king.
There will sometimes be contradictions even between good friends.
Nǐ hǎo!: Hǎo péngyou yǒu shí yě huì yǒu máodùn.
你好！: 好朋友有时也会有矛盾。

Hello!: There is contradiction between his wording.
Nǐ hǎo!:
Tā de shuōfǎ zhījiān hěn máodùn.
(also hen you maodun) (also no zhijian) (zhong1 is wrong)

Hello!: Before, it was very easy to obtain a visa.
Obtaining a visa is very important.
He applied for a visa.
I introduced Xiao Ma to a girlfriend.
Nǐ hǎo!: Wǒ gěi Xiǎo Mǎ jièshào le yī ge nǚpéngyou.
你好！: 我给小马介绍了一个女朋友。

Hello!: They're singing.
Singing is a kind of entertainment.
Nǐ hǎo!: Chànggē shì yī zhǒng yúlè. (yiyang usually just for "same")

Hello!: Singing karaoke is a way of entertaining yourself.
Nǐ hǎo!: Chàng K shì zìwǒ yúlè de fāngshì. (no ziji) (also de yi zhong fangshi)

Hello!: We also need entertainment outside of work.
Nǐ hǎo!: Zài gōngzuò zhī yú wǒmen yě xūyào yúlè.
你好！: 在工作之余我们也需要娱乐。

Hello!: We are all looking forward to seeing you and your family.
Nǐ hǎo!: wǒmen dōu qīdài kàndào nǐ hé nǐ de jiārén .
你好！: 我们都期待看到你和你的家人。

Hello!: I am look forward to being able to receive your letter very soon.
